# Primordium

Primordium is a browser game inspired by the book "How to Invent Everything" by Ryan North.
Players combine primitive elements and technologies to rebuild civilization from scratch.

## Canonical URL
- https://primordium.bobagi.click/

## Language
- Portuguese (pt-BR)
- English (en)

## Important pages
- Home: https://primordium.bobagi.click/
- Sitemap: https://primordium.bobagi.click/sitemap.xml

## Source
- GitHub: https://github.com/Bobagi/primordium
